description: Erection of a single storey rear extension
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Condition 11 (Architectural Detailing) - Officers have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied that the architectural detailing of the balconies, windows, doors, overhangs, rainwater goods, ducts, fans and louvres and their associated reveals and their relationship with the walls/fascias will ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development

Please provide copies of all existing and proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.There is no scale bar in the submiited proposed elevations and the scale bar in the existing elevations does not measure to scale.
